Package randoop.reflection

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClassVisitor
    ClassVisitor defines the interface for a visitor class that uses reflection to collect information about a class and its members.
    ReflectionPredicate
    Methods that declare whether a reflection object should be used in randoop's exploration.
    VisibilityPredicate
    Interface for predicates that check whether a class or class member is considered visible.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultReflectionPredicate
    Returns true for public members, with some exceptions (see doNotUseSpecialCase method).
    EverythingAllowedPredicate  
    NotPrivateVisibilityPredicate
    NotPrivateVisibilityPredicate is a VisibilityPredicate that returns true in the case that the class/method/constructor/field is not declared to be private.
    OperationExtractor
    OperationExtractor is a ClassVisitor that creates a collection of Operation objects through its visit methods as called by ReflectionManager.apply(Class).
    PublicVisibilityPredicate
    PublicVisibilityPredicate is a VisibilityPredicate that returns true in the case that the class/method/constructor/field is public.
    ReflectionManager
    ReflectionManager reflectively visits a Class instance to apply a set of ClassVisitor objects to the class members.
